title: New: Jimi Charles Moody – The Woman
body:
**Jimi Charles Moody** is the moniker of a currently anonymous UK chart topper.

Whoever this may be, one things for sure, he makes one hell of a soul/blues infused pop track. Not much info is available online, but all three of his currently shared track are pretty spectacular, with new cut _The Woman_ soaring with the confidence of someone who has clearly honed their craft. His voice is dark and brooding, coupled with heavy handed piano and melodramatic strings, creating a sound that is definitely hard to ignore.

Stream _The Woman_ below as well as previously released track _Other Man_:

Follow our [Spotify On Repeat playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks.
